alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 20 at 11:52AM PST until February 22 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TUESDAY TO 4 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches in the valleys and 4 to 8 inches in higher valleys such as Spring Creek and the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Northern Elko County, Southeastern Elko County, Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County, Southwest Elko County and South Central Elko County. * WHEN...From 7 AM Tuesday to 4 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southwest Elko County
